history.content:
We are searching for Design Assistants for the Maker Design Studio in PREP. We have about 15 openings still available, so apply here before they are gone!

 

Background: PREP (Pre-Engineering Program) is a three-week program offered to incoming freshmen and transfer engineering students. The 2021 dates are July 26 to August 13. 

 

As a Design Assistant, you will coach 1 or 2 teams on their design projects, work closely with the instructional staff and other Design Assistants. Experience with design skills such as coding, electronics, rapid prototyping, and design sprints is preferred but not mandatory.

 

The application is open until all positions are filled. All positions are PAID.

 

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfg0PVb4Tfx8uEjhrTZU6U04BDGjvcI2IKGo1FJFzorAgKxvQ/viewform

 

Go Bears!

--

Scott Moura, PhD (he/him/his)

Director of eCAL

Associate Professor

Clare and Hsieh Wen Shen Endowed Distinguished Professor

University of California, Berkeley
